name: Emily Tran
persona: Emily is a junior majoring in Psychology who maintains a CGPA just under 3.0. She is moderately conscientious and motivated to achieve better grades, although she sometimes struggles with self-discipline and managing test anxiety. Emily is generally persistent and doesn’t give up easily, but she occasionally doubts her academic abilities. She is eager to improve her study habits and is seeking ways to boost her confidence and performance in exams.
